column5: Another exciting season is coming up and there's lots to look forward to once Mother Nature gives us the green light!  if you read the recent NewYorks Lake Ontario 2012 Fisheries Program Hilights  http://www.dec.ny.go...012hilights.pdf there are certainly many positives to be found for the "state of the lake"  there's no doubt that various pen imprinting stocking projects, as well as habitat restoration work being done by many groups around the lake are contributing to our fantastic fishery  many of these groups & clubs also hold various tournaments & derbies to support & celebrate these ventures:  St Catharines Game & Fish Assc. Strait Line Anglers Club Port Credit Salmon & Trout Assc. Metro East Anglers Central Lake Ontario Sportsmen's Assc.  I'll encourage you to look up a group that is near you and perhaps you may want to participate with them...  have a fun, safe & successful season out on the big pond everyone!    Mark
Can't wait to get out on the big lake!
Pumped!  And Mark your right in the prime spot for early season!  I have some new micro lead core I am dying to use!
Just got my Depth Raider probe delivered this morning, w00t!
Cant wait - the boat's in for spring service, Sunday is re-spoolin' day. Weather permitting, Easter will be spring tanksgiving day - I'll settle for some browns till the kings come out to play

seems to be no end in sight for forcasted NW & NE winds...  Phil which leadcore is that ?  also don't forget folks, the St Catharines Game and Fish Association's 38th annual Spring Salmon gets underway in a few weeks!  http://www.spoonpullers.com/index.php/topic,17672.0.html
PM me .. bout that .. Im a hard core -lead-core speck fisherman .... if you've got some fancy new 'micro' version .. I'd love to try it

Here you go camillj - http://www.cabelas.com/product/Fishing/Fishing-Line/Lead-Core-Trolling-Line%7C/pc/104793480/c/104719680/sc/104590980/Tuf-Line-MicroLead-Lead-Core/1432828.uts?destination=%2Fcatalog%2Fbrowse%2Ffishing-fishing-line-lead-core-trolling-line%2F_%2FN-1100387%2FNs-CATEGORY_SEQ_104590980%3FWTz_l%3DSBC%253BMMcat104793480%253Bcat104719680&WTz_l=SBC%3BMMcat104793480%3Bcat104719680%3Bcat104590980  Bring on the Kings!

Hey gents. Yes it is the Tuf-Line Micro Leadcore.  Moving a bunch to speck anglers in Quebec Camillj.  Can't touch the Big  American corporation prices, but I have some in stock.  http://www.etackle.ca/tuf-line-microlead-small-diameter-lead-core-within-spectra-fiber-braid/
